subject: Reply required urgently in creating HTML reports
msgSnippet: Hello, Could anyone please help me in creating HTML reports using ANT task with JUNIT. I ran the below xml file using ANT but the HTML reports generated
messageBody:
Hello,
Could anyone please help me in creating HTML reports using ANT task
with JUNIT.

I ran the below xml file using ANT but the HTML reports generated
doesn't show any details of the test run though the XML file "Test-
Classname.xml" shows complete details.

<project basedir="C:/ISMC" default="Simple-html" >
<property name="test.reports" value="C:/ISMC/Reports" />
<property name="test.class.name" value="Simple" />

<path id="test.classpath">
<pathelement location="C:/ISMC" />
<pathelement location="C:/ISMC/junit3" />
<pathelement location="C:/jdk1.4/bin" />
<pathelement location="C:/jdk1.4/lib" />
</path>

<target name="Simple-html">
<junit fork="yes" printsummary="no" haltonfailure="no">
<batchtest fork="yes" todir="${test.reports}" >
<fileset dir="C:/ISMC">
<include name="Simple.class" />
</fileset>
</batchtest>
<formatter type="xml" />
<classpath refid="test.classpath"/>
</junit>

<junitreport todir="${test.reports}">
<fileset dir="${test.reports}">
<include name="Test-*.xml" />
</fileset>
<report todir="${test.reports}" />
</junitreport>
</target>
</project>

Also the TESTS-TestSuites.xml file just shows the below two lines :
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<testsuites></testsuites>

Regards,
Pooja
